label: A_hP4_194_bc-001
title: Hexagonal Graphite ($A9$) Structure
comments:
According to (Wyckoff, 1963), hexagonal graphite may be either flat, space group $P6_{3}/mmc$ \#194 or \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hP4_194_bc-001}{buckled, space group $P6_{3}mc$ \#186}. If it is buckled, the buckling parameter is small, less than 1/20 of the ``c'' parameter of the hexagonal unit cell. We assign the $A9$ {\em Strukturbericht} designation to the unbuckled structure shown here. 
 Experimentally, a \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hR2_166_c-002}{rhombohedral ($R\overline{3}m$) graphite structure} is also observed.
